mapper.select: select c.id from cp_user c WHERE c.USER_NAME=#{uname}
select c.USER_NAME from cp_user c WHERE c.id=#{id}
select c.EMAIL_BIND from cp_user c WHERE c.id=#{id} and LENGTH(c.EMAIL_BIND)>2
select c.TEL_BIND from cp_user c WHERE c.id=#{id}
select USER_NAME from cp_user where id=#{id}
SELECT b.ROLE_NAME from cp_user_role a,cp_role b where a.ROLE_ID=b.ID and a.ROLE_ID=#{id}
select * from cp_user c where c.USER_NAME=#{userName}
select * from cp_user c where c.EMAIL_BIND=#{emailBind}
select * from cp_user c where c.TEL_BIND=#{telBind}
SELECT c.ID from cp_user c ,cp_user_role d where c.ID =d.USER_ID and d.ROLE_ID=#{id}
SELECT * from cp_user c where 1=1 and c.QUESTION=#{question}
